parameters._comment: Samsung Gear 360 Dual Fisheye Camera Calibration
parameters._description: Centers normalized (0-1). FOV scale: >1.0=wider lens, <1.0=narrower (e.g., 1.0833 for 195° lens with 180° base). Distortion: r_d = r*(1+k1*r²+k2*r⁴+k3*r⁶). Rotations in radians. Each lens produces a patch spanning base_fov degrees.
parameters._WARNING: BOTH lenses must have the SAME FOV value for dual-lens cameras! Mismatched FOV causes catastrophic distortion at seams. Only use different values for asymmetric lens systems.
